definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: You ought to know better than to go out without an overcoat on such a cold day.
sentences.chinese: 你应当懂得这样冷的天不穿大衣出去可不行。

sentences.english: Astute salesmen know how to invest emotionally.
sentences.chinese: 精明的商人懂得如何感情投资。

sentences.english: In the spiritual life we have to make a distinction between two kinds of loneliness.
sentences.chinese: 在灵性生活当中，我们必须懂得区分两种不同的孤独。

sentences.english: You're great at sales, but I know you know something about computers too.
sentences.chinese: 你精通营销，但是我知道你也懂得一些电脑知识。

sentences.english: Understands the appreciation, you also then have the enchanting graceful bearing.
sentences.chinese: 懂得欣赏，你也便拥有迷人的风姿。

sentences.english: We consider it impossible that they could know how to operate a computer.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为他们不可能的懂得怎么操作电脑。

sentences.english: We understand the future belongs to those who can metaphorically surf.
sentences.chinese: 我们懂得未来将属于那些能够冲浪的人。

sentences.english: “Understanding the analytics of how your social game is being used is vital”, says Carey.
sentences.chinese: “懂得解析你游戏的使用模式很重要”，凯瑞说到。

sentences.english: Make you a grateful person by knowing people's needs around the world.
sentences.chinese: 报纸使您因为知道世上人的需要而懂得惜福感恩。

sentences.english: My husband knew how to work hard and smart.
sentences.chinese: 我的丈夫懂得如何苦干加巧干。

sentences.english: Some time I don't know why I will cry, just letting tears down capriciously.
sentences.chinese: 很多时候不懂得为何会流泪，只是肆意得任性得流下。

sentences.english: Try to understand that people needs to be understood so we can live peaceably with them.
sentences.chinese: 人们需要懂得我们和平的与他们生活。

sentences.english: It makes me understand that perseverance. makes the impossible possible.
sentences.chinese: 它让我懂得毅力可以把不可能变成可能。

sentences.english: Beauty knows to say :"Enough, "barbarism clamours for still more.
sentences.chinese: 美懂得去说“足矣”，粗野却吵嚷着要再多一分。

sentences.english: The love is not bitter, Know with love.
From the film, I have learned that being honest was extremely important and necessary.
sentences.chinese: 从影片中，我懂得了诚实是相当重要和必要的。

definition: worldly wisdom/the ways of the world/to know how to get on in the world
to stop before going too far (idiom); to stop while one can/don't overdo it/stop while you're ahead
to be good at/to be adept at
to care about/equivalent of 在於|在于[zai4 yu2]
